attributes.action: continue the funding for jodrell bank telescope
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jodrell bank telescope in Cheshire could be forced to close if proposed funding cuts are approved.
A consultation is under way to slash £2.7m a year from Britain's network of seven giant astronomy dishes including two at pickmere and darnhill.
Experts warn losing funding for the e-Merlin network could mean the end of UK participation in radio astronomy which would be a terrible loss for the whole country please help

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
